overview:
Justin J. Perreault is a general partner of Commonwealth Capital Ventures.

Prior to joining Commonwealth, Justin was COO and later CEO of Object Design, a publicly held software company. He was part of the senior team that helped to grow the companyâ€™s revenue from $20 million to $70 million, take the company public on NASDAQ, and become the leading company in its market segment. Earlier, he was a vice president at Harvard Management Company, responsible for information technology venture investments, and a consultant with McKinsey & Co., Inc.

Justin received a BS in Mechanical Engineering from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, summa cum laude, and an MBA from the Harvard Business School, where he was a Baker Scholar.

Current Investments

* Antenna Software
* ByAllAccounts
* CRI
* Expressor Software
* Kadient
* Ounce Labs
* Reval
* SoundBite Communications (NASDAQ: SDBT)

Selected Prior Investments

* Object Design (IPO)
* Kentek Information Systems (IPO)
* NexGen (IPO, later acquired by AMD)
* PriCellular (IPO)
* Qiave Technologies (Acquired by Watchguard Technologies)
